form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC Diarrhoea> Diarrheoa with Severe Dehydration

field.name: Take Action: Diarrheoa with Severe Dehydration
Refer mother/caregiver and child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Complete assessment of child, and administer appropriate treatment
Advise mother/caregiver to give frequent sips of ORS to the child on the way to the health facility, if child can take sips
Advise mother to continue breastfeeding, if child still breastfeeds. Observe mother breastfeeding and provide counseling on breast attachment and positioning, if necessary
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Advise mother/caregiver not to carry the child on her back
Teach mother/caregiver how to keep child warm on the way to the health facility
Fill out referral form. Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
Accompany mother/caregiver and child to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
